White House and CDC remove coronavirus warnings about choirs in guidance for reopening houses of worship Link: https://www.seattletimes.com/nation-world/white-house-and-cdc-remove-coronavirus-warnings-about-choirs-in-guidance-for-reopening-houses-of-worship/

Officials said there have long been concerns within the White House that there were too many restrictions on choirs. This move comes in spite the CDC's report of a "superspreader" event in Mount Vernon, Wash., that sickened dozens and killed two.
